alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Walton County through 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from De Funiak Springs to near Eglin Air Force Base to near Eglin AFB. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, Portland, Alpine Heights, Villa Tasso, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Miramar Beach, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Ridge, Gulf Pines, New Home, Knox Hill, Argyle, Sandestin and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton
